answers.answer: Hello,On this cut, apply topical antibiotic cream like Neosporin and take oral antibiotics. Also avoid intercourse and masturbation for a few days when you take these antibiotics. Also get your blood sugar levels checked as diabetes is responsible for delayed wound healing.I hope it helps. Take care and regards.

Thanks for the comment. I would like to get this problem checked out by a doctor in person also and was wondering if this is a matter for the Urology or the Dermatology deptment. I know I have posted these comments in the Urology forum but wasnt sure if this was the right place?

Look I'm 21 and I just started having this problem about 5 days ago, I thought it would go away on it's own and it didnt. I read that by puttin triple antibiodics on it that it should clear up and when it didnt I went to the doctor. THey told me that I had a yeast infection (crazy right) I thought men couldnt get this but I was wrong....... He perscribed NYSTATIN cream 15gm, not sure if it works seeing how i got it check ot to night but he told me it was definitly a yeast infection, some guys are freaked out to show their penis to a guy doctor but hey I love my guy and I still need him for now lol, go A.S.A.P and get them to look at it..... HOpe this has helped you out. P.S dnt feel alone they are alot of us out there dealing with this
*to anyone who has the same issue...look up phimosis on Wikipedia. I would go the non surgical route...the healing process is long and painful. Go with gradual stretching, prescribed cream, etc..

question: I have a small cut on my foreskin that wont heal properly. It has been about 2yrs now and nothing seems to work. I have tried Steroid creams and Thrush creams and abstained from sex and masterbation for several weeks, but this cut wont go away. It seems to be healing then if we have sex the cut reopens. It is not particularly painful just more uncomfortable, but it is making me not want to have sex with my girlfriend. I have no STD's (been  checked several times), nor does my girlfriend who is pregnant so i know everything is in working order so to speak...except from this cut. I am 27 and otherwise fit and healthy, please can someone help?
title: Small cut on Foreskin wont heal
